results.title: A resolution designating March 22, 2017, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".
results.short_title: A resolution designating March 22, 2017, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".
results.latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates March 22, 2017, as National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day. Commends rehabilitation counselors and professional organizations assisting individuals who require rehabilitation.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates March 22, 2017, as National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day. Commends rehabilitation counselors and professional organizations assisting individuals who require rehabilitation.

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S2051)
Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. (text of measure as introduced: CR S1978-1979)
